title: The roll is called support...
body:
not super mega secret op, death dealing, hog squealing, rip snorting, belly aching badass. If you run screaming head first into a 2v5 the support can't get a quadra so you can 1v1 your nemesis. Stop blaming your supports adcs.

That being said obviously a bad support is a bad support, buuuuuut don't waste the time on the blame. Just play.

edit: wut is spelling

replies.body: I typically use my ADC as bait so i can do exactly that, but i have to feed them a few kills early to pacify them first.
I saw it as soon as I posted it lol, don't think I can edit titles, so the mistake stays.
